title: Are new support champ Pyke is really a support?
body:
as tiltle HE JUST TAKE NO DIFFRENT BETWEEN AN ASSASSIN!
but well i think he is a support are focus at combat like thresh and zyra so he take no diffrent between an assassin
and if u guys dont think he look like an assassin then watch this trailer
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UjX7FAwc7lw

#StillDontKnowWhatBoardToChoose

replies.body: You know literally nothing about his kit.

Is player really bad at grammar?

Seriously, I cant understand what you said.

Maybe English isn't his first language?
People should always keep that possibility in mind.
Are board person is really an opinion?
I honestly would love an assassin support. That means I would have someone to pick when I get autofilled.

> [{quoted}](name=Atrushan2,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8BIT3W6R,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-05-12T22:38:15.304+0000)
>
> I honestly would love an assassin support. That means I would have someone to pick when I get autofilled.

nidalee is an assasin support?

> [{quoted}](name=TKM Axe,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8BIT3W6R,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-05-14T15:41:51.022+0000)
>
> nidalee is an assasin support?

Except she doesn't go bot lane usually.
i think those ropes will pretty much be like rengar E.
How can he be an assassin if he looks so huge
He is probably going to be like rakan. Get in, get off your cc and/debuffs get back out

He looks like an assassin and will probably play like one from the support role.

AKA he will do extreme damage without any need for ratios while also being extremely safe.

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8BIT3W6R,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-05-12T23:22:11.606+0000)
>
> He looks like an assassin and will probably play like one from the support role.
> 
> AKA he will do extreme damage without any need for ratios while also being extremely safe.

ye he look like an assassin but through trailer i think his passive its like kindred lol marking enemy and kill them to gain something :/
I'm expecting him to be CertainlyT levels of broken on release, only to be buffed shortly afterwards.
